src:
NBA里納德38分12籃板 破馬刺不敗金身

03 Nov 2019, 08:05

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月03日訊】NBA快船1日對戰馬刺，披上快艇戰袍的里納德（Kawhi Leonard）對戰老東家，上場34分鐘就轟了38分、12籃板和4抄截，終場快船以103：97擊退馬刺，終止黑衫軍開季3連勝。


里納德(右) 。 ( Sean M. Haffey/Getty Images)

里納德一開賽就連下8分，首節打完，快船以23：24落後馬刺1分；第二節開始，里納德持續攻擊，加上哈瑞爾（Montrezl Harrell）、威廉斯（Lou Williams）合力掃下20分，船艇以50：48在上半場結束時取得領先。
兩隊第三節持續拉鋸，末節德羅贊（DeMar DeRozan）鍥而不捨猛追分，單場進帳29分，仍無法抵擋快船攻擊，終場馬刺便以6分之差吞敗。
──轉自《大紀元》
（責任編輯：葉萍）
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/03/a102699263.html
text:
NBA Reinard 38 points and 12 rebounds, the Spurs unbeaten

03 Nov 2019, 08:05

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 03, 2019] The NBA Clippers played against the Spurs on the 1st, and Kawhi Leonard, who was wearing a speedboat shirt, played against the old club. He played 38 points and 12 rebounds in 34 minutes. 4 interception, the final Clippers repelled the Spurs 103:97, ending the Black Shirts three season winning streak.


Leonard (right). (Sean M. Haffey/Getty Images)

Linard scored 8 points in the first round and finished the first quarter. The Clippers trailed the Spurs by 23:24. At the beginning of the second quarter, Leonard continued to attack, plus Montrezl Harrell and Williams. (Lou Williams) together scored 20 points and the boat took the lead at 50:48 at the end of the first half.
The third quarter of the two teams continued to saw, and the last section of DeMar DeRozan rushed to chase points, scored 29 points in a single game, still can not resist the Clippers attack, the final Spurs will be swallowed by 6 points.
─Transfer from the Epoch Times
(Editor: Ye Ping)
